Name: Fast Food Mania 3D
About the game: Fast Food Mania 3D - a game in the genre of three in a row with a set of glasses, made in 3D graphics. In the game you have to work in a cafe, collecting arbitrary orders, making combinations of 3 or more units of one product. If there are several modes that differ in the amount of time allotted for collecting food. Try to break all records and become the best in the fast food business!
